function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited detection in rural areas","Impact":"Potential for undetected spread of contagious diseases in rural areas","Mitigation":"Enhanced testing and tracking in rural areas","Technologies":"Mobile testing units, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents in rural areas","Owner":"Health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Lack of detailed epidemic data","Impact":"Inability to accurately track and contain the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving data collection and analysis methods","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, geographic information systems","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and control measures for contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Validation and refinement of spread models through empirical data and research","Technologies":"Simulation modeling, data validation tools, scientific research methods","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
